title: Keycard multiaccount doesn't show erc20 tokens
body:
Problem 
For a multiaccount stored on keycard, the wallet doesn't show any ERC20.
This was teqsted with nightly from 06/02/2020 # 1423

Example 
- my multiaccount is stored on the phone (there are snt, sai, wbtc ...)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11461437/74144966-0f60cd00-4bfe-11ea-9bbc-8d968e08a9d3.png)

- my multiaccount is stored on a keycard (no erc20)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11461437/74144995-20a9d980-4bfe-11ea-86e1-f46d355e6493.png)

Wallet service is not running for some reason
